algorithm_technique: Hash map for frequency counting and pair finding
problem_summary_simple: Count pairs of songs whose total duration is divisible by 60.
problem_summary_technical: Use a hash map to store counts of song durations modulo 60. Iterate and find complementary durations.
key_insights: The problem relies on the property of modular arithmetic: (a + b) % k == 0 if a % k + b % k == 0 or a % k + b % k == k.
We only need to consider the remainders of song durations when divided by 60.
A hash map (or an array of size 60) can efficiently store the counts of these remainders.
